meanings.sent1: The ground quakes during an earthquake.
meanings.sent2: The old building quakes as the heavy trucks pass by.
meanings.sent3: The little dog quakes with fear during thunderstorms.
meanings.sent4: Her voice quakes with emotion as she speaks about her lost cat.
meanings.sent5: The loud thunder quakes the entire house, making the windows rattle.

meanings.sent1: The quakes of the train made the passengers uneasy.
meanings.sent2: The sudden quakes in the ground startled the hikers.
meanings.sent3: The quakes of laughter filled the room during the comedy show.
meanings.sent4: The quakes of excitement ran through the crowd as the band started playing.
meanings.sent5: The quakes of the engine signaled the start of the race.

meanings.sent1: The recent quakes have caused damage to many buildings.
meanings.sent2: People in earthquake-prone areas are prepared for quakes.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected quakes interrupted the peaceful afternoon.
meanings.sent4: The quakes in the region have scientists studying the fault lines.
meanings.sent5: The quakes felt like a giant was shaking the earth beneath their feet.
